snippet: The final members were chosen Sunday in the United States Olympic track and field trials in what has shaped up to be one of the strongest American teams assembled in years.
abstract: Final members of the United States Olympic track and field team are chosen in what has shaped up to be one of the strongest American squads assembled in years.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and MARY PILON

lead_paragraph: The final members were chosen Sunday in the United States Olympic track and field trials in what has shaped up to be one of the strongest American teams assembled in years.

headline.seo: U.S. Exits Trials With Strong Lineup for London
headline.main: U.S. Exits Trials With Strong Lineup for London
headline.print_headline: U.S. Ends Trials With Strong Lineup for London
